casebody.data:
PREISS, et al.
v.
WINE AND DESIGN FRANCHISE, LLC, et al. 390A18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 18, 2018 R. Hayes Hofler, III, Attorney at Law, for Preiss, Emily N., et al. Gloria T. Becker, Attorney at Law, Matthew Mariani, Attorney at Law, Kari R. Johnson, Attorney at Law, A. Charles Ellis, Attorney at Law, Winterville, Marla S. Bowman, Attorney at Law, Joseph A. Schouten, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Wine and Design Franchise, LLC, et al.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 14th of December 2018 by Defendants:

*441"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 18th of December 2018."

Defendants shall have up to and including the 24th day of January 2019 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
